text: Somewhere in Time is a studio album by Iron Maiden. It went on sale on 29 June 1986. It was the third most popular album in England when it started being sold. The album got average reviews; one reviewer said that it was "less inspired" than Iron Maiden's earlier albums, but that the first half of it was still good. ==Track listing== ==Musicians== * Bruce Dickinson – vocals * Dave Murray – guitar, guitar synth * Adrian Smith – guitar, backing vocals * Steve Harris – bass guitar, backing vocals, bass synth * Nicko McBrain – drums ==References== Category:1986 albums Category:Iron Maiden albums Category:Heavy metal albums
title: Somewhere in Time (album)
